title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Skills: QM-Based Online Language Course Design with Simulation/VR Integration

context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners achieve 80% accuracy in applying work-related language expressions (meetings/phone calls/emails) through at least three VR-based role-play assessments
Learners acquire the ability to revise language assignments based on peer feedback (twice weekly) within online collaboration tools
Learners establish and execute self-directed learning plans reflecting 16 QM standard core elements (clarity of course objectives, content alignment, etc.)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
